name: Appsolutely Pointless Quiz
description:
The Appsolutely Pointless Quiz is a fun little 5 minute social question game, also available on the PLAY store for Android download that is a product of creating a bigger project for free global learning/education as it enables the questioning and remote examination function of a content app without violating privacy policies. That is all to come in a later project.

If however you are interested in making your own and see how I have achieved this, then please see my YouTube tutorial https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAtIgxHqacNg_ae0hHfU9twB6smxWUqND

Enjoy
